location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morier, Tehran to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that no further supplies should be provided to the Persian Government, on the account of the subsidy, from the date of the cessation of hostilities between Persia and Russia. It further notes that James Morier is of the opinion that a set of supplies sent in lieu of subsidy should be returned to India.
